Posts.Content: yes. i had a thicking in my right breast no lump. went pcp, ahd exam was wold not to worry just get mammogram when scgeduled. had mammogram. it was clear. i knew something was wrong. had ultrasould, nothing definitive. i begged for am mri...finally...cancer. luckily it was stage one with no node invovlement. had mastecomy, on zolodex and arimidex. side effects are TOO much. talked to onco about removing other breast (i'm DD) it's very uncomfortable and i have a lot of anxiety about a reoccurance there. i want off the meds my other breast removed. sorry needed to vent. as far as your aunt, please have her pursue the issue. had i not had the mri, the cancer would not have been found. my best to you both.
Posts.Title: Request for advice

Posts.Content: i was diagnoesed with breasr cancer last march.did not show up on mammogram, had to fight for ultrasound and mri. yep cancer. had a mastecomy. clear nodes, stage 1, close to chest wall. thank you Lord for that. i had large breast DD. i am on zolodex injections and anastrozole. i am having severe joint pain. my mother was first diagnosed at 27 yo and died of other cancers at 47 yo. i am having a lot of anxiety and back and neck pain from the inbalance of my body. the side effects of the meds are awful. i want to have my other brest removed and be done with the worry and the meds. will i have to continue the meds even if the other breast is removed. worried about ovarian, uterine and the other female cancers. can someone please advise me on thsi thank you very much
Posts.Title: elective mastecomy
